EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.St Louis Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in St. Louis at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Friday, May 19, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: CIC @ 4240 4240 Duncan Ave, #200, St. Louis, MO 63110 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/search/CIC+@+4240+4240+Duncan+Ave,+%23200+St.+Louis,+MO+63110/@38.6358164,-90.252059,17z/data=!3m1!4b1?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/st-louis?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
